title: 3D Developer at VRARMR, Delhi
description: At VRARMR, I work on diverse projects, including 3D development, full-stack applications, and AI solutions.
Over the past year, I have contributed to various projects such as a real-time 3D chatbot and video/audio editing software using FFmpeg.
Optimized AI model performance by reducing latency for generative models.
Utilized AWS hosting services for auto-scaling and load balancing to improve reach.
Developed creative solutions to enhance marketing strategies, such as a web-based face-swapping tool and AI-powered celebrity-customized videos for marketing using lip-sync and voice cloning.
Built an AR instant app with an enhanced tracking system for a seamless user experience.
Created multiple AR gamified templates to improve user engagement and showcase AR capabilities.
Developed VR walkthroughs using web-based libraries such as Three.js and Babylon.js.

title: Full Stack Intern at Renderpub, Bengaluru
description: Renderpub is a product-based company.
Developed a 3D editor and pipeline for creating metaverses.
Worked on generalizing the codebase to support various solutions.
The workflow involved creating a web-based 3D meeting platform similar to Google Meet or Microsoft Teams, allowing users to meet in a virtual environment, explore spaces, and communicate.
Enabled users to design their own virtual spaces by uploading 3D models, configuring settings, and instantly creating their metaverse.

title: Freelance 3D Developer
description: Developed a walkthrough application using React-Three-Fiber.
Delivered a high-quality, interactive 3D experience for a client.
Created a VR experience using React and React-Three-Fiber as a paid opportunity.

title: Intern at Novelty AR
description: Novelty AR is a startup focused on creating AR solutions for marketing strategies.
My daily tasks involved developing gamified AR templates using Zapper.
This experience enhanced my basic skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Three.js, which helped me further in my career.
I worked at this company during my college years.
It was a paid opportunity.
